Package com.intellij.openapi.fileTypes

Interface FileTypeRegistry.FileTypeDetector

  • Enclosing class:
    FileTypeRegistry

    public static interface FileTypeRegistry.FileTypeDetector
    Pluggable file type detector by content

    • Field Detail

      • EP_NAME

        static final ExtensionPointName<FileTypeRegistry.FileTypeDetector> EP_NAME

    • Method Detail

      • detect

        FileType detect(VirtualFile file,
                ByteSequence firstBytes,
                java.lang.CharSequence firstCharsIfText)
        Detects file type by its (may be binary) content on disk. Your detector must be as light as possible. In particular, it must not perform any heavy processing, e.g. PSI access, indices, Documents etc. The detector must refrain from throwing exceptions (including pervasive ProcessCanceledException)
        Parameters:
        file - to analyze
        firstBytes - of the file for identifying its file type
        firstCharsIfText - - characters, converted from first bytes parameter if the file content was determined to be text, or null otherwise
        Returns:
        detected file type, or null if was unable to detect

      • getDetectedFileTypes

        @Deprecated
default java.util.Collection<? extends FileType> getDetectedFileTypes()
        Deprecated. unused
        Returns the file type that this detector is capable of detecting, or null if it can detect multiple file types.

      • getDesiredContentPrefixLength

        default int getDesiredContentPrefixLength()
        Defines how much content is required for this detector to detect file type reliably. At least such amount of bytes will be passed to detect(VirtualFile, ByteSequence, CharSequence) if present.
        Returns:
        number of first bytes to be given

      • getVersion

        int getVersion()
